TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LockedActivityGlyph extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides a glyph for an to display when the activity associated with the designer cannot be modified.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
An activity designer displays LockedActivityGlyph when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A> property is set to `true`.
